name: Dice Factory (Narada)
description:
This game was intended to be in the GMTK game jam for 2022 with the theme of role of the dice. Unfortunately, I did not submit the build to the game jam. This was my first ever game jam that I joined on Itch.io, as a result, I confused the submission of the game with uploading the project on Itch.io.  Thus, the game was never entered into GMTK jam.

(I don't recommend playing in full screen since the game runs slower)

Controls:

R for Rolling the die

Space for speeding up the box

Left mouse button to subtract from the box value

Right mouse button to add to the box value
